errors.error_description: The `pip install` command uses `python_rucaptcha` with an underscore, but the correct package name on PyPI is `python-rucaptcha` with a hyphen, which will cause the installation to fail.
The image path for finding the API key is incorrect (`docs/img.png`), causing the image to not display. The correct path is `files/img.png`.
correction_candidates: The image is deprecated; remove the entire line.
Change the image path from `.../docs/img.png` to `.../files/img.png`.
Change the image path from `.../docs/img.png` to `.../assets/img.png`.
The image link is an absolute URL and should be `https://raw.githubusercontent.com/AndreiDrang/python-rucaptcha/master/files/img.png`.
errors.golden_answer: Change the image path from `.../docs/img.png` to `.../files/img.png`.
